languages.text: "Ты начинаешь понимать суть вещей, Изгой! Жалость — удел беспомощных. Так что продолжай дарить мне свою боль и отчаяние — как и раньше".
"You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."
languages.original_text: "Ты начинаешь понимать суть вещей, Изгой! Жалость — удел беспомощных. Так что продолжай дарить мне свою боль и отчаяние — как и раньше".

traits.locale_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你终于开始领悟事情的本质了，流浪者！同情是弱者的特权。继续与我分享你的痛苦与绝望吧——就像过去那样。”
languages.original_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."

traits.locale_text: “你终于开始领悟事情的本质了，流浪者！同情是弱者的特权。继续与我分享你的痛苦与绝望吧——就像过去那样。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous commencez enfin à voir la véritable nature des choses, Errante ! La pitié est l'apanage des faibles. Alors, continuez à me nourrir de votre souffrance et de votre désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."

traits.locale_text: « Vous commencez enfin à voir la véritable nature des choses, Errante ! La pitié est l'apanage des faibles. Alors, continuez à me nourrir de votre souffrance et de votre désespoir. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr beginnt langsam, die wahre Natur der Dinge zu sehen, Ausgestoßene! Nur Machtlose haben Mitleid. Also gebt mir weiter Euren Schmerz und Eure Verzweiflung, genau wie zuvor."
languages.original_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr beginnt langsam, die wahre Natur der Dinge zu sehen, Ausgestoßene! Nur Machtlose haben Mitleid. Also gebt mir weiter Euren Schmerz und Eure Verzweiflung, genau wie zuvor."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前は物事の本質を理解し始めているようだな、追放者！同情は無力な者のすることだ。だから、俺に苦痛と絶望を与え続けるのだ。お前が前にしたようにな」
languages.original_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は物事の本質を理解し始めているようだな、追放者！同情は無力な者のすることだ。だから、俺に苦痛と絶望を与え続けるのだ。お前が前にしたようにな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¡Por fin empiezas a ver las cosas como son, proscrita! La lástima es el terreno de los impotentes. Sigue ofreciéndome tu dolor y desesperación como hiciste en su momento».
languages.original_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por fin empiezas a ver las cosas como son, proscrita! La lástima es el terreno de los impotentes. Sigue ofreciéndome tu dolor y desesperación como hiciste en su momento».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."

languages.text: "Eşyanın gerçek doğasını görmeye başlıyorsun Kimsesiz! Acıma, âcizlerin alanıdır. Bu yüzden acın ve ümitsizliğin benim için yeterli. Bildiğin gibi devam et."
languages.original_text: "You are beginning to see the true nature of things, Outcast! Pity is the province of the powerless. So continue to give me your pain and despair — just as you did before."

traits.locale_text: "Eşyanın gerçek doğasını görmeye başlıyorsun Kimsesiz! Acıma, âcizlerin alanıdır. Bu yüzden acın ve ümitsizliğin benim için yeterli. Bildiğin gibi devam et."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
